text: AIK (which stands for Allmänna Idrottsklubben), is a sports club from Sweden. It is one of the biggest and one of the oldest in the country. It was founded in 1891. The name means Common (or Public) Sports Club. It has departments for many different sports including football, ice hockey, bandy, golf, table tennis, bowling, and handball. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Sports clubs in Stockholm Category:1891 establishments in Sweden
title: Allmänna Idrottsklubben
